results.title: Gold Price Volatility Takes Centre Stage in Mitrade Market Outlook 2026, Aligning with Asia CFD Trading Sentiment - Thailand Business News
results.content:
Summarize with ChatGPTShare on Linkedin

MANILA, Philippines, Jan. 29, 2026 /PRNewswire/ — As financial markets head into 2026 under the weight of macroeconomic uncertainty, shifting monetary policy and geopolitical risk, spot gold has re-emerged as a key focus for CFD traders across Asia. For many, the Lunar New Year is a time to recalibrate trading strategies — and gold, long seen as a symbol of wealth and stability, remains central to that planning.

results.content:

## Saxo Bank fined around $50m by Danish FSA

The Danish Financial Supervisory Authority (DFSA) has issued an administrative fine of DKK 313,000,000 (approximately $50 million) to 

Saxo Bank
 for alleged violations of the country's Money Laundering Act. [...] by Dharmesh Mistry

Venture Capital Funding [...] ## BitGo IPO raises $212.8m, valuing firm at $2.1bn

Digital asset infrastructure company BitGo has officially gone public on the New York Stock Exchange.

The initial public offering (IPO) launched on 22 January at $22.43 per share, exceeding the initial predicted range of $15 to $17, before closing at $18.49. During its debut, BitGo sold approximately 11.8 million shares, raising $212.8 million and achieving a valuation of $2.1 billion.

Listed under the ticker symbol BTGO, Goldman Sachs and Citigroup served as the lead underwriters for the offering. According to 

BitGo's filing with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)
, CEO and co-founder Michael Belshe has retained control of more than 50% of the company's total voting power.

Read more here
